Welcome to Yongfei's Homepage




About me

I’m a Postdoc Scholar at Southern California Earthquake Center (SCEC), University of Southern California. I work on observability of rupture dynamics and earthquake ground-motion and fault-displacement simulations



Eduction

  • Ph.D in Geophysics (2019)
    Joint UCSD/SDSU Geophysics PhD Program
    Committee: Steven Day (co-Chair), Peter Shearer (co-Chair), Kim Olsen, Yuri Fialko, Sam Shen and Jiun-Shyan(JS) Chen
  • B.S in Geophysics (2013)
    University of Science and Technology of China
    Advisor: Sidao Ni


Research Area:

  • Earthquake Surface Rupture
  • Earthquake Rupture Dynamics
  • Earthquake Strong Ground Motion
  • High-performance Computation
  • 3D Visualization
